Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

AccessRules.description: An object that sets the public accessibility of objects in the specified bucket.

GetObject.description: Specifies the anonymous access to all objects in a bucket.
GetObject.markdownDescription:
Specifies the anonymous access to all objects in a bucket.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

AllowPublicOverrides.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the access control list (ACL) permissions that are applied to individual objects override the getObject option that is currently specified.
AllowPublicOverrides.markdownDescription:
A Boolean value that indicates whether the access control list (ACL) permissions that are applied to individual objects override the getObject option that is currently specified.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

Update requires: No interruption

BucketName.markdownDescription:
The name for the bucket.

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 54

Update requires: Replacement

BundleId.description: The ID of the bundle to use for the bucket.

AbleToUpdateBundle.description: Indicates whether the bundle that is currently applied to a bucket can be changed to another bundle. You can update a bucket's bundle only one time within a monthly AWS billing cycle.

Indicates whether the bundle that is currently applied to a bucket can be changed to another bundle. You can update a bucket's bundle only one time within a monthly AWS billing cycle.
